item.title: Santana - Oye Como Va
item.description: Am and D with no picking parts. This is for some teachers/students who find the additional picking parts unnecessary or distracting.

item.title: Santana - Oye Como Va - Key of D
item.description: Only D and Am chords! Watch out for the syncopated rhythms throughout. Try the bass line! To practice the parts (at a slower speed and at the original speed), go to this video: https://youtu.be/Vl_I4jfsMvE

item.title: Santana - Oye Como Va
item.description: Use this video to practice the syncopated strums and the picking. Then visit the play-along of the whole song and jam: https://youtu.be/g5kipSXZVMI
